flawed_nl_solution:
Cornelia visited 42 countries - 20 countries - 10 countries = <<42-20-10=8>>8 countries which were outside of Europe and South America.
Half of those 8 countries were in Asia, so there were 8 countries / 2 = <<8/2=4>>4 Asian countries that Cornelia visited.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
